title: Discover the healing power of trees. Tree meditation and tree healing
text:
Courses & workshops
Discover the healing power of trees. Tree meditation and tree healing
Friday, 12/05/2023
/
[Waldhof e.V. - Academy for Continuing Education](https://veranstaltungen.freiburg.de/events/en/el-waldhof-ev-academy-for-continuing-education-983?source=widget&widgetToken=2UvrbVzILvI.&)
Trees can be companions of the soul, givers of strength and comfort. In this seminar you will experience the effect of trees in a holistic way. You will go through a varied program during these three days and go home with a rich knowledge. During an excursion you will learn about the exciting botany of trees, their history, their mythology and their healing properties then, as now, and the use of the different parts of the tree in the kitchen. The contemplative part of the seminar, the mindful approach through a silent meditation, will take place in nature directly by the trees and also indoors, through a guided mediation. For this you don't need any previous knowledge, just a commitment to the moment of encounter, with yourself and the tree. Such an experience of nature in silence can have a deeply regenerating effect on our soul. We will also have a small, healthy snack in between, which we will make from tree leaves. The benefit of the seminar: a deeper connection with nature and, as a consequence, with our own nature. This can promote personal development, also in terms of stability, which is very helpful in the current, turbulent times.The expense contribution for the healthy snack from self-filled Norway maple leaves (5 €) will be settled on site directly with the course leader.
Course leader: Schiller, Martine. The course instructor is a wild plant expert with a focus on arboriculture/tree medicine. She completed her training in 2004 at the renowned "Freiburg School of Medicinal Plants". She is also a health practitioner for personal development and has been leading tree meditation groups for 10 years.
